languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Bladedancer parries a melee attack while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal damage to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of Veil of Blades, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

Whenever the Bladedancer under the Veil of Blades effect parries a melee attack, they deal 50% of their normal damage to the attacker. While under the Veil of Blades effect, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack into an enemy is increased by +20%.

Whenever the Bladedancer under the Veil of Blades effect parries a melee attack, they deal 50% of their normal damage to the attacker. While under the Veil of Blades effect, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack into an enemy is increased by +20%.

Whenever the Bladedancer parries a melee attack while under the effect of Veil of Blades, they deal 50% of their normal damage to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of Veil of Blades, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvía{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} bajo el efecto de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Velo de acero{/g}, inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} normal al atacante. Además, mientras está bajo el efecto de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Velo de acero{/g}, la probabilidad de redirigir un ataque a distancia contra un enemigo aumenta un +20 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvía{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} bajo el efecto de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Velo de acero{/g}, inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} normal al atacante. Además, mientras está bajo el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Velo{/g} de acero, la probabilidad de redirigir un ataque a distancia contra un enemigo aumenta un +20 %.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}ブレードのヴェール{/g}の効果を受けながら{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}たび、攻撃者に対して通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%を与える。さらに、{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}ヴェール{/g}の効果を受けているとき、ブレードダンサーの範囲攻撃を敵に向けて反らす確率は+20%増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}ブレードのヴェール{/g}の効果を受けながら{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}たび、攻撃者に対して通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%を与える。さらに、ブレードの{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェール{/g}の効果を受けているとき、ブレードダンサーの範囲攻撃を敵に向けて反らす確率は+20%増加する。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}在{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}森罗刃网{/g}状态下{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}格挡{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，可对攻击者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于通常伤害的50%。此外，当刀锋舞者处于{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}森罗刃网{/g}状态时，偏转敌人远程攻击的几率提高20%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}在{g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}森罗刃网{/g}状态下{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}格挡{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，可对攻击者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于通常伤害的50%。此外，当刀锋舞者处于{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}{/g}森罗刃网状态时，偏转敌人远程攻击的几率提高20%。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} sous l'effet de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Voile de lames{/g}, il inflige 50 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} normaux à l'attaquant. De plus, sous l'effet de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Voile de lames{/g}, le danselame a +20 % de chances supplémentaires de dévier une attaque à distance ennemie.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} sous l'effet de {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Voile de lames{/g}, il inflige 50 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} normaux à l'attaquant. De plus, sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Voile{/g} de lames, le danselame a +20 % de chances supplémentaires de dévier une attaque à distance ennemie.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} unter dem Effekt von {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Schleier der Klingen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, verursacht er beim Angreifer 50 % seines normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Zudem erhöht sich unter dem Effekt von {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Schleier der Klingen{/g} die Chance des Klingentänzers, einen gegnerischen Fernkampfangriff abzulenken, um +20 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Additionally, while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, the Bladedancer's chance to deflect a ranged attack at an enemy is increased by +20%.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} unter dem Effekt von {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Schleier der Klingen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, verursacht er beim Angreifer 50 % seines normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Zudem erhöht sich unter dem Effekt von {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Schleier{/g} der Klingen die Chance des Klingentänzers, einen gegnerischen Fernkampfangriff abzulenken, um +20 %.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} под действием {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Покрова из клинков{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он наносит атакующему половину своего обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Также под действием {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Покрова из клинков{/g} вероятность перенаправить дистанционную атаку в противника увеличивается на 20%.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} while under the effect of {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Veil of Blades{/g}, they deal 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} под действием {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Покрова из клинков{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он наносит атакующему половину своего обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Также под действием {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Покрова из клинков{/g} вероятность перенаправить дистанционную атаку в противника увеличивается на 20%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Bıçakların Örtüsü{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındayken bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısını{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturursa{/g} saldırganın normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarının{/g} %50'sini verir. Ayrıca Kılıç Dansçısı, {g|f:0e1aff9bec3c49e2996001be4f56a3de}Bıçakların Örtüsü{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındayken menzilli saldırıları düşmana saptırma olasılığı, +%20 artar.
